A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just a bad movie. Discombobulated direction\, miscalculated character arcs\, and a massive wasted opportunity. Forced humour was painful. Sub-plot for Finn's character was inane. Benecio del Toro's character was unwatchable.  Yes\, there were some good moments but they were easily overwhelmed by all the surprisingly bad one's. PLEASE no more Rian Johnson Star Wars films!
